dataSource.name: Q_PRINCIPALE
dataSource.select: SELECT -- Regle 0 J : fact avec contrat decode (fac.fcodcompta , '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') dc_fcodcompta, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3) ) dc_fdep, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5) ) dc_fdeppole, count(*) dc_count0, 0 dc_count1, 0 dc_count7, 0 dc_count15, 0 dc_count30, 0 dc_count60 FROM contrat cnt, facture fac WHERE fac.fregcompta between to_date(:p_datdebut,'DDMMYYYY') and to_date(:p_datfin,'DDMMYYYY') and round( fac.fregcompta - fac.fdatsai ) = 0 and fac.numcont is not null and cnt.filcode = :p_param3 and cnt.soccont = fac.soccont and cnt.numcont = fac.numcont and cnt.cav = fac.cav and fac.fmodreglt <> 8 &P_where GROUP BY decode (fac.fcodcompta, '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') , to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5)), to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3)) UNION ALL SELECT -- Regle 0 J : fact sans contrat decode (fac.fcodcompta, '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') dc_fcodcompta, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3) ) dc_fdep, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5) ) dc_fdeppole, count(*) dc_count0, 0 dc_count1, 0 dc_count7, 0 dc_count15, 0 dc_count30, 0 dc_count60 FROM facture fac WHERE fac.fregcompta between to_date(:p_datdebut,'DDMMYYYY') and to_date(:p_datfin,'DDMMYYYY') and round( fac.fregcompta - fac.fdatsai ) = 0 and fac.numcont is null and fac.fmodreglt <> 8 &P_where GROUP BY decode (fac.fcodcompta, '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') , to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5)), to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3)) UNION ALL SELECT -- Regle 1 - 30 J : fact avec contrat decode (fac.fcodcompta, '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') dc_fcodcompta, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3) ) dc_fdep, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5) ) dc_fdeppole, 0 dc_count0, count(*) dc_count1, 0 dc_count7, 0 dc_count15, 0 dc_count30, 0 dc_count60 FROM contrat cnt, facture fac WHERE fac.fregcompta between to_date(:p_datdebut,'DDMMYYYY') and to_date(:p_datfin,'DDMMYYYY') and (round( fac.fregcompta - fac.fdatsai )) BETWEEN 1 AND 30 and fac.numcont is not null and cnt.filcode = :p_param3 and cnt.soccont = fac.soccont and cnt.numcont = fac.numcont and cnt.cav = fac.cav and fac.fmodreglt <> 8 &P_where GROUP BY decode (fac.fcodcompta, '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') , to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5)), to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3)) UNION ALL SELECT -- Regle 1 - 30 J : fact sans contrat decode (fac.fcodcompta, '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') dc_fcodcompta, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3) ) dc_fdep, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5) ) dc_fdeppole, 0 dc_count0, count(*) dc_count1, 0 dc_count7, 0 dc_count15, 0 dc_count30, 0 dc_count60 FROM facture fac WHERE fac.fregcompta between to_date(:p_datdebut,'DDMMYYYY') and to_date(:p_datfin,'DDMMYYYY') and (round( fac.fregcompta - fac.fdatsai )) BETWEEN 1 AND 30 and fac.numcont is null and fac.fmodreglt <> 8 &P_where GROUP BY decode (fac.fcodcompta, '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') , substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5), substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3) UNION ALL SELECT -- Regle 31 - 90 J : fact avec contrat decode (fac.fcodcompta, '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') dc_fcodcompta, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3) ) dc_fdep, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5) ) dc_fdeppole, 0 dc_count0, 0 dc_count1, 0 dc_count7, count(*) dc_count15, 0 dc_count30, 0 dc_count60 FROM contrat cnt, facture fac WHERE fac.fregcompta between to_date(:p_datdebut,'DDMMYYYY') and to_date(:p_datfin,'DDMMYYYY') and (round( fac.fregcompta - 120 J : facture avec contrat decode (fac.fcodcompta, '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') dc_fcodcompta, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3) ) dc_fdep, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5) ) dc_fdeppole, 0 dc_count0, 0 dc_count1, 0 dc_count7, 0 dc_count15, count(*) dc_count30, 0 dc_count60 FROM contrat cnt, facture fac WHERE fac.fregcompta between to_date(:p_datdebut,'DDMMYYYY') and to_date(:p_datfin,'DDMMYYYY') and (round( fac.fregcompta - fac.fdatsai )) > 120 and fac.numcont is not null and cnt.filcode = :p_param3 and cnt.soccont = fac.soccont and cnt.numcont = fac.numcont and cnt.cav = fac.cav and fac.fmodreglt <> 8 &P_where GROUP BY decode (fac.fcodcompta, '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') , to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5)), to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3)) UNION ALL -- Regle 120 PLUS J : Fact sans contrat SELECT decode (fac.fcodcompta, '6391504' , 'A6391504', '6396206' , 'B6396206', '6391506' , 'C6391506', 'ZAUTRE') dc_fcodcompta, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,3) ) dc_fdep, to_number(substr(to_char(fac.fdeppole,'FM0000000'),1,5) ) dc_fdeppole, 0 dc_count0, 0 dc_count1, 0 dc_count7, 0 dc_count15, 0 dc_count30, count(*) dc_count60 FROM facture fac WHERE fac.fregcompta between to_date(:p_datdebut,'DDMMYYYY') and to_date(:p_datfin,'DDMMYYYY') and (round( fac.fregcompta -
